security.title: pdfCircle has Your Security You Can Trust
security.subtitle: Your privacy and data security are our top priorities

localProcessing.title: Local Processing
localProcessing.description: Files are processed on your device when possible

endToEnd.title: End-to-End Encryption
endToEnd.description: Secure file transfers with advanced encryption

noStorage.title: No File Storage
noStorage.description: We don't keep copies of your files

free.question: Is it really free?
free.answer: Yes, all our core features are completely free to use!

fileSize.question: What’s the maximum file size?
fileSize.answer: We support files up to 100MB for free users.

fileHandling.question: How are my files handled?
fileHandling.answer: Files are processed securely and not stored on our servers.

formats.question: What file formats are supported?
formats.answer: We support PDF, JPG, PNG, Word, Excel, and more!

account.question: Do I need an account?
account.answer: No account is required for basic features.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Yes, we use encryption and local processing to ensure security.

footer.description: The pdfCircle Ultimate All-in-One Solution for PDF and Image Conversion, Compression, and Editing

home.description: Use PDFcircle, the all-in-one free online tool for PDF and image processing. Easily convert, compress, merge, and enhance your files at no cost
